sqls.sql: UPDATE me_qa_cause_import_tmp SET qa_cause_id = @qa_cause_id, qa_cause_status = @qa_cause_status, qa_cause_no = @qa_cause_no, qa_cause_name = @qa_cause_name, qa_cause_py = @qa_cause_py, qa_cause_type = @qa_cause_type, qa_cause_type1 = @qa_cause_type1, qa_cause_type2 = @qa_cause_type2, qa_cause_is_default = @qa_cause_is_default, factory_no = @factory_no, crt_time = @crt_time, crt_user = @crt_user, crt_user_no = @crt_user_no, crt_user_name = @crt_user_name, crt_host = @crt_host, upd_time = @upd_time, upd_user = @upd_user, upd_user_no = @upd_user_no, upd_user_name = @upd_user_name, upd_host = @upd_host, qa_cause_rmk01 = @qa_cause_rmk01, qa_cause_rmk02 = @qa_cause_rmk02, qa_cause_rmk03 = @qa_cause_rmk03, qa_cause_rmk04 = @qa_cause_rmk04, qa_cause_rmk05 = @qa_cause_rmk05;
